title: 0261 | เปิด ripe-atlas probe กันเถอะ
content:
docker-compose.yml

services:
  ripe-atlas:
    image: jamesits/ripe-atlas:latest
    restart: always
    environment:
      RXTXRPT: "yes"
    volumes:
      - "./etc:/var/atlas-probe/etc"
      - "./status:/var/atlas-probe/status"
    cap_drop:
      - ALL
    cap_add:
      - CHOWN
      - SETUID
      - SETGID
      - DAC_OVERRIDE
      - NET_RAW
#    mem_limit: "64000000000"
#    mem_reservation: 64m
    labels:
      - "traefik.enable=false"
      - "com.centurylinklabs.watchtower.enable=true"
    logging:
      driver: json-file
      options:
         max-size: 10m
    network_mode: "host" # if possible, avoid double NAT
    # security_opt:
    #   - seccomp:unconfined

รันแล้วจะได้ไฟล์ public key ใน folder ./etc/probe_key.pub เอาไปใส่ใน https://atlas.ripe.net
author: icez
